resources.string: Weight less than normal is not good. If you are very tall, but the weight is too small. Risk of insufficient nutrition or not enough energy. The result is a weak body. Eat enough and exercise to strengthen the muscles can help to increase the BMI to normal.
The proper weight for Thai people is BMI between 18.5-24.9. Far from the disease caused by obesity. And the risk of disease is minimal. Try to keep BMI levels as long as possible.

Try to lose weight to the standard because the BMI in this period is still considered a group of people who are obese. It is not considered fat. If family history is diabetic and high blood pressure. It is also considered more risk than normal.
